title: Larry Ellison gives $40bn personal backing to Warner Bros Discovery bid
description: Oracle co-founder has agreed to backstop Paramount’s $108bn hostile bid personally
content: Oracle co-founder has agreed to backstop Paramount’s $108bn hostile bid personally
